properties.areaDesc: Oakland; Washtenaw; Lenawee; Monroe; Macomb; Wayne; Livingston
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 5 at 6:25PM EST by NWS Detroit/Pontiac MI
properties.description:
WEATHER...

* Snow increases coverage during the early evening and then
becomes more intense after 8 PM. A Winter Weather Advisory
remains in effect from 8 PM through 4 AM tonight.

* The first inch of accumulation is expected by about 10 PM and
bands of heavier snow will continue past midnight.

IMPACTS...

* Accumulating snow will lead to slippery conditions on untreated
roads particularly on bridges, exit ramps, and overpasses.

* Expect limited visibility for motorists through the evening.
properties.instruction:
* Motorists are urged to use caution and account for hazardous
driving conditions by slowing down and allowing extra time.

* Prepare, plan and stay informed. Visit http://go.usa.gov/c7kkP

NWSheadline: SNOW DEVELOPING RAPIDLY ACROSS THE REGION THROUGH EARLY EVENING
